```

  ✖ This is an unexpected use of the delete operator.

    1 │ const arr = [['a','b','c'], [1, 2, 3]];
  > 2 │ delete arr[0][2];
      │ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Recommended fix

  - delete arr[0][2]
  + arr[0][2] = undefined
```
